title: Points Awarded in Error
description: Points that have not been legally earned by a $Jammer:jammer$ and have been awarded to the team incorrectly and/or erroneously by an Official or as the result of a technology malfunction.
regExp: /([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|^)(Points Awarded in Error|point awarded in error|points awarded-in-error|point awarded-in-error)([\s\,\.\!\-\(\)\'\"\“\”\’]|$)/gi
